column_order_and_meaning.name: polarity
column_order_and_meaning.critical: Must be exactly 0 or 1 — no True/False, no -1/+1

column_order_and_meaning.name: timestamp_normalized
column_order_and_meaning.description: Timestamp normalized over the entire recording: (t - t_min) / (t_max - t_min)
column_order_and_meaning.note: Original timestamps in seconds or microseconds → must be scaled to [0,1] before saving

how_to_convert_from_aedat4_v2e.code_snippet:
with AedatFile(path) as f:
    ev = [[e.x, e.y, 1 if e.polarity else 0, e.timestamp] for e in f['events']]
    ev = np.array(ev)
    ev[:,3] = (ev[:,3] - ev[:,3].min()) / (ev[:,3].max() - ev[:,3].min() + 1e-12)
    np.save(output_npy, ev)

input_to_model_after_loading.channel_order: channel 0 = ON events, channel 1 = OFF events
